sentences.sentence: Which will have started to taste like a sourdough.
sentences.translation: 这将开始一个拓荒者的味道。

sentences.sentence: This books opens the door to a very simple approach to sourdough.
sentences.translation: 此书籍开启了大门，一个非常简单的方法来拓荒者。

sentences.sentence: Two jumbo jacks, one sourdough.. - got a favorite parking spot here, Bob.
sentences.translation: 两个巨无霸，一个酵母汉堡。-喜欢停在哪里，鲍勃。
